1680910.name: Golf Together
1680910.description:
What is Golf Together about?

Golf Together is a multiplayer focused mini golf game. Where you can shoot at your own pace. Each level consists of 18 holes you can complete. Players have the ability to create their own levels using the build-in level editor. All content you see in the screenshots has been put together using this level editor. This is to ensure using it is the best experience a user can have.

Features

* Online multiplayer through either internet or LAN. Single player mode is also included.
* Extensive game customization, tweak the game to your own liking.
* In game level editor that allows you to create and share levels in-game.
1680910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
